pages.text: Legends say that, the Divine Dragon gave his power to some species. He gave the Immortal Power to Humans, so-called Divine Heir. While the Gust Power was given to our Tengu.$(br2)The Beginning Cycle of Lunar Calendar, The year of Origin. The Divine Dragon left quietly and create the Barrier, which separates the Humans and the Youkais. A calendar cycle past.

According to the legends, Divine Dragon's leaving was because of Fushigiri, the Blade of Killing the Immortal.$(br2)It was said that, the Blade got its name Hairui because it got the Divine Dragon's tears.$(br2)The crimson tachi which was able to injure the Divine Dragon...$(br2)It is said that there were another Blade called Kaimon.

Why is this power owned by Humans...$(br2)The Divine Heir's Immortal Power was so astonishing, however, he also owned the power to slay the Immortal.$(br2)I have witnessed the horrible sight after the owner of the crimson tachi committed massacre.$(br2)But now, the tachi and the Kusabimaru are both in my hand.
Something is tempting me to unsheathe the two Blade.$(br2)But I do not.
